comment: Have downloaded and uninstalled so many different weather apps, lost count. Finally, a keeper.  Like the live sounds, animations as well. Easy and accurate, if having a more extensive weather forecast is for you, this has that too.

author: R Ortmans
comment: Looks great AND it's based on close (though not always the closest and most relevant) local weather stations and networks. I have asked support for assistance to rectify this error.

reply.author: Exovoid Sàrl
reply.content: Could you please send us a message directly from the application, using the button labelled "I have a problem" ? This will automatically include technical data that will help us solve your issue. You can find it using the icon in the top left corner.

comment: Too many words and numbers. Not a single simple graph. This is very tiresome. Oh, of course, it's got a lot of fun sounds and pictures.

author: azlan afridi
comment: I never saw before like this accurate, local and world weather with smart live wallpapers. I love it really. May Allah/God shower his peaceful blessings upon you brothers/sisters. Thanks.
Rubbish! Cannot get this app to work. Keeps saying I need a working internet connection ...I can connect to the internet...tried on both 4G and and Wi-Fi

author: Charles Koster
comment: Great weather animation Love it also accurate. I've tried many different weather apps and end up deleting for different reasons.Needless to say I've kept this one
After last updates the app keeps "loosing" favorite locations forcing me to do the same thing everytime I try to use it :(

reply.author: Exovoid Sàrl
reply.content: Could you please send us a message directly from the application, using the button labelled "I have a problem" ? This will automatically include technical data that will help us solve your issue. You can find it using the icon in the top left corner.. We will be happy to help you !

author: J3F3 '
comment: Maybe this is just on Galaxy S8+, but why doesn't the widget extend to the top of the screen? Resizing the largest sized widget still leaves a big, ugly and unusable gap between the top of the app and the top of the screen. Bad design.

reply.author: Exovoid Sàrl
reply.content:
Could you please send us a screenshot of the issue for analysis ? 

To make a screenshot on an Android device just press and hold the "Volume Down" and "Power" buttons at the same time. 
Please send us an e-mail to support@exovoid.ch . We will be happy to help you !

author: RAJAB MAISI
comment: GREAT APP  Its awesome and useful app.Im no longer afraid of weather changes,I can now travel with no hesitation.

author: Derek Earles
comment: Its never right weatherwise might as well look out of the window every morning at least you know what your getting

author: KEVIN CUE
comment: Excellent application. Very convenient to see hourly, daily, many days weather! Accuweather is awkward.

author: Melanie Bertram
comment: I really like this Weather app. Very informative, easy to read and understand. Gets right to the point. And for those that travel a lot, they can check weather in other parts of the country and world.

author: jeannie MILLS
comment: Accurate and up to date weather and forecast. Easy to read . nice interface. Best weather app so far.i highly recommend it.

author: gerard mcbride
comment: This is the best weather App I have had on my phone / tablet. Also great graphics and sound  effects just give it that extra edge on Others. 1st Class, cheers, Ger.

author: Delores Ellis
comment: I think this is a good app and I can look at the weather on my phone and see what the weather looks like and everything

author: Carvalho Voador
comment: Used to be okay, now even fails to invoke GPS, then (unsurprisingly) says location cannot be determined, sets it randomly by itself thus rendering the app pretty useless (thanks to lack of manual city selection feature)

reply.author: Exovoid Sàrl
reply.content: Could you please send us a message directly from the application, using the button labelled "I have a problem" ? This will automatically include technical data that will help us solve your issue. You can find it using the icon in the top left corner. We will be happy to help you !

author: Valentyna Over
comment: Very good app. The most comfortable design, a lot of nice details ( umbrella becomes bigger with more chance of rain), cool animation. Very accurate information. Has all I need. Vertical hourly forecast!! More apps need to be this way.

author: Terry Dorman
comment: I earlier rated this weather app as 5 * having used it for over two years and having found most others useless I'd like to give it 6 * but that's not an option !!!

author: Fathi Chan
comment: Never mind, I've figured it out. Thank you! Everything goes fine, don't worry! It works really much!

author: Peter Dunne
comment: Terrific weather app that gives accurate weather info for all my local areas including future forecasts. Definitely worth downloading. Not hard on battery either.
Love the noise of weather each day! Clear info, enjoy looking ahead, accurate forecasts too!

!!!! FINALLY !!!! I've been searching for a good weather app that has a multitude of real time information, thats easy to read, easy to use and has a variety of widgets that can be configured multiple ways.

author: Anna Bernhard
comment: Had a problem at first. Figured it out and it's great.

author: Debbie Wesson
comment: Not had app for very long but seems quite accurate and updates regularly throughout the day.

author: web scent
comment: App is not working in these days firstly it tries to search and after sometime stop searching and does not respond please update the app and introduce lite mode so that it get update on slow network

reply.author: Exovoid Sàrl
reply.content: Could you please send us a message directly from the application, using the button labelled "I have a problem" ? This will automatically include technical data that will help us solve your issue. You can find it using the icon in the top left corner.We will be happy to help you !

author: Andy Robus
comment: Like this. the only thing i would like to see changed is the moveable weather temp is too transparent on the live wallpaper and gets lost especially when there are clouds so i would like to be able to change the transparency of the text of the location and temp or put a black outline around the text to make it show up more on the live background wallpaper

author: Bill Wyatt
comment: I look outside to see if you are correct most often are not bad!

author: Debbie Stevens
comment: Trustee little tool which weather predictions have been (so far) pretty accurate  😊

author: Dinaissa Caba
comment: Until now im very pleased with the application.

author: Herman Alvanza
comment: Kukasih 3 bintang dlu ya..msalah nya ni appcuma mndkung bhsa sistem gk ada setting buat mengubah bahasa manual nya..di hp ku bhasa inggris..gmn cara ubh ke bahasa indo nya..bknya ni apliksi buatan indo..

author: Sandrus Daniel
comment: very accurate and reliable, super app I had this app for 2 years and is very satisfied with it super app

author: J. E. T.
comment: I really enjoy the various options and the live weather  is always the best wallpaper!
Why do I have the Weather XL PRO and stil have adverts on it

reply.author: Exovoid Sàrl
reply.content:
The ad-free version is an in-app purchase.
Please send us an e-mail to support@exovoid.ch . We will be happy to help you !

author: LeeAnn Porpora Cortellessa
comment: I like this app but you can only choose 2 locations. I live in Connecticut not New York. Is there a way to change the location.
Has a sound effect unlike the other wapps
Nice easy to read and colorful .The clouds and sun pictures are really  nice. Just what I need to know about the weather .. Accurate  .

author: Kim Rundquist
comment: Its ok 👍.not five stars.
